columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: practitioner_key
columns.dc:title: Practitioner Key
columns.schema:description: A unique identifier for a practitioner within the responsible organisation. Assigned by the organisation.

columns.name: practitioner_category
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - Category
columns.schema:description: The type or category of the practitioner, as represented by a code.

columns.name: atsi_cultural_training
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - ATSI Cultural Training
columns.schema:description: Indicates whether a practitioner has completed a recognised training programme in the delivery of culturally safe services to Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples.

columns.name: practitioner_year_of_birth
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - Year of Birth
columns.schema:description: The year the practitioner was born.

columns.name: practitioner_gender
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - Gender
columns.schema:description: The term 'gender' refers to the way in which a person identifies their masculine or feminine characteristics. A persons gender relates to their deeply held internal and individual sense of gender and is not always exclusively male or female. It may or may not correspond to their sex assigned at birth.

columns.name: practitioner_atsi_status
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Status
columns.schema:description: Whether a person identifies as being of Aboriginal and/or Torres Strait Islander origin, as represented by a code.

columns.name: practitioner_active
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - Active
columns.schema:description: A flag to represent whether a practitioner is actively delivering services. This is a system field that is aimed at helping organisations manage practitioner codes.

columns.name: practitioner_tags
columns.dc:title: Practitioner - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for the practitioner.
